channel.title: Quality on implementationDetails('flutter')
channel.description: Recent content in Quality on implementationDetails('flutter')

item.title: Underscore for unused parameters
item.description: Sometimes you have to deal with given functions, interface implementations or builders, with parameters you don’t use. When utilizing those you can use an underscore to actively mark unneeded parameters as not used in your code. You can use multiple underscores if multiple parameters are unused.
